Class GraphicImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.GraphicImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, Graphic, Storable
public class GraphicImpl extends BaseObjectImpl implements Graphic
A graphic is an image which can be displayed on a DMS
Author:
Douglas Lau
